page.title: 05POPULATION OF WYDDIAL
page.content: 1981 Census listed 123 persons in Wyddial parish.64 male, 59 female. In 1985 there were only three households in the village consisting of retired persons. Social classes are extremely varied. Near Cave Gate where road straighting has left the old road as a small level enclosure gypsy families have established a semi_permanent camp.Two or three towed caravans stay there for several months at a time.The towing lorries are used for collecting scrap metal to sell.Seasonal agricutural work such as potato lifting (on farms east and south of this block) is another source of income.
